name: COLORADO COALITION FOR DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES
description: Non-profit agency serving persons with developmental disabilities and their families.
sampleDescriptions: As leader of a coalition of Colorado Community Centered boards, Developmental Pathways is seeking to extend the compliance timeline and clarify provisions of CMS HCBS rules on conflict-free case manag
